AutoLockOnLoad: Auto Lock When The Page Loads
SettingsBackgroundRepeatInfo: Set Zoom to less than 100% to see the repeating background.
CloseSettingsPrompt: Any changes since the last save will be lost.
DataResetEverythingInfo: Deletes all local and cloud sync data
DeleteAllWidgetsWarning: Are you sure you want to delete all the widgets on the current workspace?
FontInfo: Global font style, weight, and colour, can be overridden by individual widget styling.
FontWeightInfo: Some weights may be unsupported by the chosen font.
Name: Name
NasaApod: NASA Astronomy Photo of the Day
Title: Title
PresetsInfo: Using Presets will change all style options.If checked, the background and widget styling will also be changed.
SettingsLanguage1: I welcome any translation help to fix mistakes and adding new translations and languages. See the link below for more info on how to help.
SettingsResetInfo: Resets settings only. Does not delete any workspaces, widgets, or widget styles
WorkspaceGlobalStyleInfo: Appling the workspace switcher style globally will save the current position, size, and visibility, on all other workspaces.
WidgetBlurInfo: Blur may not be supported in some browsers
about1: I hope you find this extension/site useful! It's still in active development, so I'll add new features and improvements when I can.
backup1: Backup data has been copied to your clipboard.
backup2: If you have made changes since the last save, click Save first, then Copy backup again.
backup3: Make sure you Save first before backing up.
contact1: Report issues and request new features here.
contact2: Join the community. Post questions and share your ideas and screenshots here. I'd love to see your designs!
ClearAndResetEverythingWarning: All workspaces, settings, widgets, bookmarks, etc, will be deleted. This will also delete any browser sync data.
ClearAndResetSettingsWarning: Only settings will be reset. Workspaces, Widgets and Bookmarks will be kept.
DeleteWorkspaceWarning: All widgets, bookmarks, notes, etc will be deleted for this workspace. This cannot be undone.
donate3: I hope you enjoy this extension/site and find it useful.
donate4: For those who would like to, a small tip for my work and future development would be very appreciated :)
donate5: Buying me a coffee, or tea, would be very appreciated
privacy1: No personal nor identifying data is collected or stored.
privacy2: Website configuration data, and the data you enter into widgets, is only saved locally in your web browser. If Browser Sync is enabled, then it will also be associated with your browser account.
privacy3: If you clear your web browser cache, your saved data will be lost.
privacy4: If you clear your web browser cache and do not have Browser Sync enabled, your saved data will be lost.
privacy5: Generating backups is done locally in your web browser.
privacy6: Cloudflare Analytics is used on this site, but is annonymous and only used for gauging a rough user base.
privacy7: Using the Steam auto workspace load feature, only uses your Steam ID to fetch the current playing game and username, directly from the Steam API. Your Steam ID, like all other data, is only saved locally in your web browser.
privacy8: This site/extension is not sponsored, endorsed, licensed by, or affiliated with Valve in any way.
restore1: Copy your saved backup data to the clipboard, then press CTRL+V here
restore4: Please try again, or upload a backup file instead.
SettingsAnimations1: Animates the widgets when in Edit Mode.
SettingsBackground1: Use an image with a small file size for faster loading.
SettingsBookmarks2: This can be changed independently per bookmark in the widget editor.
SettingsBookmarks3: This setting however, applies to all existing and new bookmarks, overiding independently set options.
SettingsBorder1: Enable and set border colours in the widget editor.
SettingsButton2: Automatically sets this settings window state to minimised when entering Edit Mode.
SettingsEffects1: Effects can be toggled off independently in the widget properties.
SettingsEffects2: Toggling this will reset any independent overrides.
SettingsLockScreen2: Go To Lock Screen Button Style
SettingsLockScreen4: Using this does not encrypt the passcode or data.
SettingsLockScreen5: It can be bypassed. It just prevents prying eyes from glancing.
SettingsSync1: You need to be logged into your web browser account to sync. Your browser will sync this data every 10 minutes to the cloud, or when you click 'Sync Now' in your browser.
SettingsTheme1: Unfortunately, your browser does not support 'backdrop-filter', which is required for this option :(
SettingsTheme2: Makes the theme background translucent and blurry
SettingsWorkspace2: Disabling this does not delete any saved workspaces
SettingsWidgetAlignGuide1: This is only visible when in Edit Mode
SettingsWidgetMargins1: Requires Page Reload. Side effect, makes widgets slightly smaller when increased.
steam3: Find Steam App IDs for games
steam4: Intended for Steam's in-game overlay browser.
steam5: Automatically load a certain workspace when running a specific game.
steam6: You must set your Steam profile game details to public for this to work.
steam7: Use the edit buttons in the workspaces menu to add Steam App IDs.
steam8: Make sure your Steam profile and game details are public.
steam9: You must have a game running for the test.
steam10: Make sure your Steam ID 64 is correct.
steam11: It should be a long number, not your username.
steam12: If your Steam ID 64 is correct, a server monkey will be despatched to investigate the error.
ToolTipWorkspace: Automatically loads a workspace when running a specific game. You need to enable this option in the settings menu.
ToolTipDownloadWorkspace: Download a save file for this workspace. You can share this with other people. If you enable widgets, this will include any widget content.
welcome3: Cobalt lets you fully customise the layout and style of your homepage.
welcome4: Here are a couple quick style options to get started:
welcome5: Enter Edit Mode to access more colours and style options in the settings menu
welcome7: Add new widgets from the settings menu
welcome9: In Edit Mode you can move and resize widgets
welcome10: Edit the widget styles and properties here
welcome11: Add multiple workspaces with their own layouts, widgets and style options
welcome13: This extension/site is still a work in progress. Any bugs/issues can be reported, along with any ideas and feature suggestions, here
welcome14: Join the Reddit community to get inspiration and post your designs!
